original_text: The father of Moses' wife was called Jethro. He was the priest for the Midian people. He heard about all the things that God had done for Moses and for the Israelites. He also heard how the Lord had brought Israel out of Egypt.
korean_text: 모세의 장인이며 미디안 제사장인 이드로가 하나님이 모세에게와 자기 백성 이스라엘에게 하신 일 곧 여호와께서 이스라엘을 애굽에서 인도하여 내신 모든 일을 들으니라

sentences.original_text: The father of Moses' wife was called Jethro.
He was the priest for the Midian people.
He heard about all the things that God had done for Moses.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 하나님이 모세를 위해 하신 모든 일에 대해 들었습니다.
그리고 이스라엘 백성들을 위해 하신 일도 들었습니다.

sentences.original_text: He also heard how the Lord had brought Israel out of Egypt.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또한 주께서 이스라엘을 이집트에서 이끌어내신 방법도 들었습니다.
